entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 06:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: WNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
